definition: to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
more/even more/further/still/still more
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.chinese: 更换的系统模块又一次重新安装。

sentences.english: The distance of the braiding product is not adjustable. If necessary, the gear to be replaced shall be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 编带产品间距不可调，如果需要调整要更换齿轮。

sentences.english: That is the reason he must change partners endlessly.
sentences.chinese: 这是为什么他会不断的更换伴侣。

sentences.english: The colorful pocket in the front can change the color as customer require.
sentences.chinese: 前面彩色的裁片可根据客户的要求更换颜色。

sentences.english: That process can repeat over and over, so the cells rarely need replacing.
sentences.chinese: 这个过程可以不断的重复，所以电池几乎不需要更换。

sentences.english: For good performance of the spark plug you need to replace it regularly.
sentences.chinese: 为了好的性能，你应该定期更换火星塞。

sentences.english: The wear-out of plane tyres is serious and should be replaced periodically.
sentences.chinese: 由于飞机轮胎磨损快，要求经常更换。

sentences.english: Most stores will allow the purchaser to exchange goods.
sentences.chinese: 大多数商店将允许顾客更换商品。

sentences.english: You may want to change the furniture placement in your living room or paint the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你也许会想更换客厅里家具的位置或者卧室里的挂画。

sentences.english: We will repair or replace free of charge any non-moving part found to be defective.
sentences.chinese: 我们会对有缺陷的非移动部件免费进行维修或更换。

sentences.english: The door cover of the host can be opened for convenience of cutters.
sentences.chinese: 主机门盖可打开，便于检修和刀具的更换。

sentences.english: Clean the bearings, or replace them if worn out.
sentences.chinese: 清理轴承，如果已经用坏，请更换新轴承。

sentences.english: Clean the injector port, replace critical injection port seals, replace injection port liners, and change septa as needed.
sentences.chinese: 清洗进样口，如有必要，更换密封垫，衬管，隔垫。

sentences.english: The magazine has not suffered by a change of editorship.
sentences.chinese: 这家杂志社并未因更换编辑而受到损失。

sentences.english: The DIMM on the controller needs replacement.
How do I replace the latch spring on my 7000 Series reel?
sentences.chinese: 如何更换7000系列卷轴锁紧装置上的弹簧？

definition: to replace with sth new/to upgrade
to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
to damage/to injure
maintenance (of equipment)/to protect and maintain
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to age (of person or object)/becoming old
to exchange/to change places/to swap
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to dismantle/to take apart
to wash/to clean/to purge
to alter
to become damaged
to unload/to dismantle
to change/to alter/to modify
to change (sth)/to alter (sth)/to change over (to sth else)
to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
